nodes.text: The Radiant VII was a Consular-class space cruiser of the Galactic Republic. It notably transported the Jedi Knights Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi to the planet Naboo, where they were to negotiate with Viceroy Nute Gunray of the Trade Federation. The cruiser delivered the Jedi ambassadors on time, but was destroyed along with its crew by order of Darth Sidious, the Federation's secret master.
